<title level="1" right="Rules">[Using Items](/Rules.aspx?ID=687)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 531 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
This section presents the rules for how characters use alchemical items, magic items, and other special items during play. 

 The myriad types of items give their powerful boons in different ways. Some function automatically, while others need to be activated. While you need only swing a _[flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) greataxe_ to scorch foes, you need to invest a [_diadem of intellect_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=401) for it to work, imbibe an [_elixir of life_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) to heal yourself, activate [_slippers of spider climbing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=465) to walk up a wall, activate your [_mail of luck_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=155) to protect yourself, and Cast a Spell using a magical scroll.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
